DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study assess agreement two different scan mode RS-3000 Lite .
DOC.criteria: Subjects pathology eye Subjects follow condition : Diabetes mellitus ( DM ) and/or diabetic retinopathy Uncontrolled Hypertension ( HT ) Cerebral infarction , cerebral hemorrhage , cranial nerve neoplasm central nervous system diseases affect vision Cardiac , hepatic , renal hematologic diseases A current condition require systemic administration steroid A history , currently receive , anticancer therapy Epileptic seizure optically induced Dementia Note : Additional criterion may apply
